title: How to add a book to a Kindle device without buying it from the Amazon Kindle Store - Quora

response.answer_text: The way I do it is to download the ebook file to my desktop computer, then plug my Kindle into my desktop via USB. The Kindle will cause a folder to open on the desktop. You just drag the ebook file into the folder and it will show up on your list of books. (See this link for more detailed instructions - or you can google it if these don’t work for you - https://www.epubor.com/transfer-books-to-kindle-kindle-fire-hd-paperwhite-kindle-for-androidipad-app-from-pcmac.html)

Kindle only shows those books which you purchased or suggested book. So you have to buy book if you want to see them in your device. However you can add those books in your Amazon cart if you want your see them in future.
